duties_responsibilities.duty: Engage with guests to ensure a great, customized guest experience and provide effective purchase and return solutions.
Share technical product education and articulate the value and benefit of the product.
Conduct accurate and timely guest transactions and execute market-relevant omnichannel programs.
Collaborate with team members to ensure optimal guest experience and support store operations.
Perform product presentation tasks and use in-store technology to support store operations.
Maintain a safe work environment and adhere to applicable policies, procedures, and laws or regulations.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma, GED, or equivalent
